body:
hi, all


there is a photo=20
http://www.geocities.com/rastermon/cup.html
that i took from a paticular environment. i wanna
use radiance to render it so that i can evaluate the fidelity of the
synthetic image compared with the photographs of the real scene.


i have already model those objects in MAYA, and export the obj file.
now, i use plastic material for the wood floor and dielectric for the=20
plastic
cup,but it does not look very realistic.
 so , which kind of material do u think is suitable for the floor and
the cup in my scene?
